name: Bedroom Horrors
description:
You are awoken by the sounds of moans and discover that boogeymen are after you. With only your flashlight you have to fight them off. Good thing light is their greatest weakness.

Use your mouse to aim and let the light do the work.

Spacebar to turn on lamp if you want to.

Warning: Unfinished but mostly there.

- Slowed mouse movement and fixed lose menu.
